params.sqlcmd: "select " +" USER_MST.\\"USER_CD\\" as \\"USER_CD\\", " +" USER_MST.\\"USER_NAME\\" as \\"USER_NAME\\", " +" USER_MST.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" USER_MST.\\"PASSWORD\\" as \\"PASSWORD\\", " +" USER_MST.\\"ADDRESS\\" as \\"ADDRESS\\", " +" USER_MST.\\"LOCALE\\" as \\"LOCALE\\", " +" USER_MST.\\"APPR_POWER_TYP\\" as \\"APPR_POWER_TYP\\", " +" USER_MST.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_NAME\\" as \\"PLANT_NAME\\", " +" USER_MST.\\"SECTION_CD\\" as \\"SECTION_CD\\", " +" MORG.\\"ORG_NAME\\" as \\"ORG_NAME\\", " +" TO_CHAR(USER_MST.\\"PASSWORD_CHG_DATE\\",'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"PASSWORD_CHG_DATE\\" " +"from " +" USER_MST, " +" M_PLANT, " +" ( " +" select " +" M_ORG.\\"ORG_CD\\" as \\"ORG_CD\\", " +" M_ORG.\\"ORG_NAME\\" as \\"ORG_NAME\\" " +" from " +" M_ORG " +" where " +" M_ORG.COMPANY_CD = ? " +" ) MORG " +"where " +" MORG.ORG_CD(+) = USER_MST.\\"SECTION_CD\\" " +" and USER_MST.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\"(+) " +" and USER_MST.\\"USER_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" USER_MST.\\"USER_CD\\" as \\"USER_CD\\", " +" USER_MST.\\"USER_NAME\\" as \\"USER_NAME\\", " +" USER_MST.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" USER_MST.\\"PASSWORD\\" as \\"PASSWORD\\", " +" USER_MST.\\"ADDRESS\\" as \\"ADDRESS\\", " +" USER_MST.\\"LOCALE\\" as \\"LOCALE\\", " +" USER_MST.\\"APPR_POWER_TYP\\" as \\"APPR_POWER_TYP\\", " +" USER_MST.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_NAME\\" as \\"PLANT_NAME\\" " +"from " +" USER_MST, " +" M_PLANT " +"where " +" USER_MST.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\"(+) " +" and USER_MST.\\"USER_CD\\" = ? " +"for update nowait"
"select " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_NAME\\" as \\"PLANT_NAME\\" " +"from " +" M_PLANT " +"where " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.\\"DISPLAY_NAME\\" as \\"DISPLAY_NAME\\" " +"FROM " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE, " +" USER_MST " +"where " +" USER_MST.\\"LOCALE\\" = SUBSTR(SYS_TYPE_VALUE.\\"DISPLAY_NAME\\",1,2) " +"and " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.\\"NAME\\" = 'LOCALE' " +"and " +" USER_MST.\\"USER_CD\\" = ? " +" " +" "
"SELECT " +" M_ORG.\\"ORG_CD\\" AS \\"ORG_CD\\", " +" M_ORG.\\"ORG_NAME\\" AS \\"ORG_NAME\\" " +"FROM " +" M_ORG " +"WHERE " +" M_ORG.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" AND M_ORG.\\"ORG_CD\\" = ?"

cell.name: BUSINESS_GROUP_DISP_FLG
cell.description: 所属部門チェックボックス表示フラグ

cell.name: OWN_PERSON_CD
cell.description: 得意先マスタの自社担当者
